actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States should take the initiative in seeking the establishment by the United Nations of an international policy imposing on the governments of countries in which international terrorists seek sanctuary with hostages a duty to make every reasonable effort to free those hostages.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the United States should take the initiative in prompting the United Nations to establish an international policy imposing on the government of a country a duty to make every reasonable effort to free any hostages held by international terrorists seeking sanctuary in such country.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States should take the initiative in seeking the establishment by the United Nations of an international policy imposing on the governments of countries in which international terrorists seek sanctuary with hostages a duty to make every reasonable effort to free those hostages.
